page_content:
30  |  SafetyPanther Premium 
Logistics On-Road 
Performance Highlights 
On-road performance measures and policies also apply to all 
independent contractors, owner operators and fleet owners in 
our Panther fleet. In addition to compliance training required by 
the Federal Motor Carrier Safety Administration (FMCSA), we’ve 
developed proprietary compliance systems and processes that 
allow us to continuously monitor fleet compliance and on-road 
performance. We have implemented a variety of programs to 
heighten awareness and reduce violations and incidents.
